jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
People in GOJEK are not necessarily the best people from reputable universities. We welcome everyone with an immense passion to learn, high resilience and fun at the same time. It is our job being part of GO-TROOPS to challenge, support and inspire one another because we only get better because of one another. We know that changing the world is hard work, we want to make sure we LOVE the people we work with.

Job Description: 
- To become a ‘thinking partner’ in problem-solving for operations team and stakeholders, by providing data from multiple sources including drivers, customer, and merchant’s operations.
- To develop clear and well-structured analytical plans and to analyse relevant data-sets to derive insights and recommendations.
- To deliver high quality, accurate and impactful analytical solutions to support business growth.
- To design and to develop dashboard or reporting to oversee operational performance monitoring and influence the decision-making process.
- To work with several large & complex SQL scripts and derive reports from Data Warehouse.
- To prepare and present analysis results to stakeholders.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Bachelor's Degree from a reputable university with 2-3 years of relevant experience.
  • Strong Excel/data management skills. Intermediate to advanced SQL proficiency is a must.
  • High curiosity and huge passion to take a deep dive into data. 
  • Comfortable with numbers, great analytical skills, strong attention to details and high level accuracy in work produced
  • Strong verbal and written communication skills. 
  • Positive, team-player, and energetic attitude.
  • Work well with cross-functional teams in a high-pressure environment.
